content.text:
# Teen Choice Award for Choice Movie Scene Stealer

The following is a list of Teen Choice Award winners and nominees for Choice Movie Scene Stealer. Formally awarded as two separate categories from 2010 to 2012: Choice Movie Male Scene Stealer and Choice Movie Female Scene Stealer.
Winners and nominees
2010s
{| class="wikitable" width="95%" cellpadding="5"
|-
| rowspan="4" align="center"| 2010
! colspan="3"| Choice Movie – Male Scene Stealer
|-
| Kellan Lutz – The Twilight Saga: New Moon
|Sean Combs – Get Him to the Greek
George Lopez – ''Valentine's Day
James Marsden – Death at a Funeral
Mark Wahlberg – Date Night
| align="center"|
|-
! colspan="3"| Choice Movie – Female Scene Stealer
|-
| Ashley Greene – The Twilight Saga: New Moon
|Dakota Fanning – The Twilight Saga: New Moon
Anne Hathaway – Alice in Wonderland and Valentine's Day
Anna Kendrick – The Twilight Saga: New Moon and Up in the Air
Betty White – The Proposal
| align="center"|
|-
| rowspan="4" align="center"| 2011
! colspan="3"| Choice Movie – Male Scene Stealer
|-

|Andrew Garfield – The Social Network
Riley Griffiths – Super 8
Ken Jeong – The Hangover Part II
Justin Timberlake –  The Social Network
